item.title: Shape of you
item.description: Here is the tutorial 《Shape Of You》全网最细2.0整首英文歌教唱 Here is a MV 【MV】黄老板新单-《Shape Of You》中英字幕 [Verse 1] A club isn’t the best place to find a lover So the bar is where I go (Mm) Me and my friends at the table doin’ shots Drinkin’ fast and then we talk slow (Mm) And you come over and start up a conversation with just me And trust me, I’ll give it a chance now (Mm)

item.title: The stray birds
item.description: Stray birds of summer come to my window sing and fly away. And the leaves of autumn, which have no songs, flutter and fall there with a sigh. O troupe of little vagrants of the world, leave your footprints in my words. The worlds puts off its mask of vastness to its lover. It becomes small, as one song, as one kiss of the eternal. It is the tears of the earth that keep her smiles in bloom.
